content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DOSTXT
      operator: matches_regex
      value: ^\d*\.?\d*$
    - name: --DOSTXT
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000094
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error if --DOSTXT value is numeric.
Outcome:
  Message: --DOSTXT value is numeric.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0112
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A textual description of the quantity of an agent
                  (e.g., drug, substance, radiation) taken or absorbed at a single
                  administration.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error if --DOSTXT value is numeric.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A textual description of the quantity of an agent (e.g., drug, substance, radiation) taken or absorbed at a single administration.
